author: Cara Lombardo
title: J.C. Penney Cuts 360 Jobs
text:
J.C. Penney Co. eliminated 360 jobs and shuffled its executive team as the department store reported disappointing sales that sent its shares down nearly 10% Friday morning.
The company said it is cutting roughly 130 jobs at its Plano, Texas, headquarters. An additional 230 positions were cut related to its group, regional, district and store support teams, in a move that reallocated more people to customer-facing positions. The job reductions will result in annual savings of as much as $25 million, the company said.
